mapper.update: update DEPARTMENT set DEPARTMENT_NAME = #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMINISTRATIVE_DUTIES = #{administrativeDuties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIRECTOR = #{director,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUMBER_OF_PERSON = #{numberOfPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TELNUM = #{telnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME, ADMINISTRATIVE_DUTIES, DIRECTOR, NUMBER_OF_PERSON, TELNUM, ADDRESS, DESCRIPTION, LEVEL from DEPARTMENT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME, ADMINISTRATIVE_DUTIES, DIRECTOR, NUMBER_OF_PERSON, TELNUM, ADDRESS, DESCRIPTION, LEVEL from DEPARTMENT
